The name of a limited partnership may not contain the name of a limited partner unless:
It is also the name of a general partner; or
The business of the limited partnership had been carried on under the name before the admission of that limited partner.
Except for words specified in § 1-502(f) of this subtitle, the name of a professional corporation may not use any other word, abbreviation, affix, or prefix that indicates it is a corporation.
